title: Hello, Butterfly
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 23 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: In the book Hello, Butterfly students will read about the gorgeous and delicate insects called butterflies. The photographs will help students learn about the different sizes, colors, and designs of butterflies. Students will have the opportunity to identify the main idea and locate supporting details, as well as to ask and answer questions. The appealing photographs, repetitive sentences, and high-frequency words support early emergent readers.
reviewWords: big, butterfly, green, hello, new, red, small, spotted, striped
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial and Final Sounds                : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
wordWork: Concept Words                : Recognize, write, and use color words
